data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Describe the climate in your city and explain how the climate has affected the city's culture."
data.answer: The climate in my city is one of the most agreeable all over the world. Firstly, two-thirds of the whole year are sunny with plenty of sunshine and moderate temperature, ranging from 20 to 28 degrees. Secondly, there is sufficient rainfall during spring and summer, which provide enough water for plants and animals, as well as people’s daily needs. Furthermore, such climate has positive effects on my city’s culture. To be specific, people enjoy exercising outdoors due to the excellent weather, and they are also more open-minded in communicating with others during the time they do sports. (98 字)
